original_text: For the moth shall eat them up like a garment, and the worm shall eat them like wool: but my righteousness shall be for ever, and my salvation from generation to generation.
korean_text: 옷 같이 좀이 그들을 먹을 것이며 양털 같이 좀벌레가 그들을 먹을 것이나 나의 공의는 영원히 있겠고 나의 구원은 세세에 미치리라

sentences.original_text: For the moth shall eat them up like a garment
sentences.korean_translation: 옷과 같이 좀이 그것들을 먹을 것이니

sentences.original_text: and the worm shall eat them like wool
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 양털처럼 벌레가 그것들을 먹을 것이나

sentences.original_text: but my righteousness shall be for ever
and my salvation from generation to generation
